document.full_text: south african tim clark faced the prospect of having to withdraw from the masters because of a lingering elbow injury after gritting his way to a one-over-par 73 in thursday's opening round.
document.title: clark fights a losing battle in augusta pain game
lines_and_colors: south african tim clark faced the prospect of having to withdraw from the masters because of a lingering elbow injury after gritting his way to a one-over-par 73 in thursday's opening round.
